items.title: Trump’s predecessors would be unsettled by his naming obsession
items.description: The nation’s past chief executives, with rare exceptions, have refrained from slapping their names on things while in office.

items.title: Trump’s pardons wipe out payments to defrauded victims
items.description: In addition to clearing prison sentences, the president’s clemency actions have erased millions in restitution payments.
